title: Login Troubles [Mac Client]
body:
Since patch 6.2 I've been having trouble logging in. After entering my account details, the client opens then closes after a second. Takes multiple attempts to login, and even when I do, I get constantly disconnected from chat after a few minutes.

I can enter games fine in the brief moments the client works, and nothing is an issue when I'm actually in game. After the game ends, I return to the client and it crashes instantly.

I have the latest OSX installed, and I've also tried repairing and repatching the client but nothing seems to fix it.

Does anyone know how to fix it? 
Any help is appreciated :)

replies.body:
Hey xWill,

Please give the solutions in the [**Login Issues (Mac)**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues#section-mac) Riot Games Support article a try, and let me know if the issue persists.
Hey, I tried everything suggested in that article and still experiencing the same problems.
